titles.title: A bill entitled the "James River Basin Flood Control Act".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 9/7/1993--Introduced. Modifies the project for flood control in the James River Basin, Richmond, Virginia, to authorize the Secretary of the Army to construct the project at a total cost of $134 million, with an estimated Federal cost of $100.5 million and an estimated non-Federal cost of $33.5 million.
